arcade.env.comp

Class PulseComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • arcade.env.comp.PulseComponent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Component, java.io.Serializable, sim.engine.Steppable

    public class PulseComponent
extends java.lang.Object
implements Component
    Implementation of Component for pulsing sources.

    This component can only be used with SourceSites. This component affects the source concentration of the specified molecule (PULSE_MOLECULE). The amount of media for the given surface area of the simulation (MEDIA_AMOUNT) is used to determine the total amount of molecule available. The molecule concentration is updated each step as the molecule is consumed or otherwise removed from the environment. At the specified pulse interval (PULSE_INTERVAL), a "pulse" of media is introduced, updating the total amount of molecule available.

    Since:
    2.3
    Version:
    2.3.0
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • PulseComponent

        public PulseComponent(MiniBox component)
        Creates a Component object for pulsing.

        Specifications include:

        • PULSE_MOLECULE = molecule that is being pulsed
        • PULSE_INTERVAL = interval between pulses
        • MEDIA_AMOUNT = media amount per surface area
        Parameters:
        component - the parsed component attributes
